instructions: put the plate on the charger
put the napkin on the plate
place the dinner fork to the left of the charger
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork
place the dinner knife to the right of the charger, with the blade facing the charger
place the tea spoon to the right of the dinner knife
place the soup spoon to the right of the tea spoon
place the water glass above the dinner knife
place the wine glass to the right of the water glass
place the wine glass bellow the wine glass, above the spoons
place the coffee cup to the right of the wine glass
place the bread plate above the forks
place the butter knife on the bread plate with the blade facing the left
place the desert fork above the charger with the tines facing the right
place the dessert spoon below the dessert fork, with the bowl facing the left
